data.actual_result: the audio plays on call speakers. Redoing the steps will switch the speakers back.
data.expected_result: the audio plays on system speakers
data.short_description: Changing the "use speaker" setting while in-call causes all other audio to switch speakers after the call ends.
data.steps_to_repro: - be in a DM call - open the voice settings - switch the state of the "use speaker" setting - exit call - play audio from another app
